text: Tama-Plaza Station (たまプラーザ駅,たまぷらーざえき) is a railway station of Tokyu Corporation in Aoba-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. ==Gallery== File:Tama-Plaza Station 01.jpg|Concourse File:中央改札.JPG|Fare control File:Tama- Plaza Station5.JPG|Station Platform ==Adjacent stations== ;Tokyu Corporation : Tōkyū Den-en-toshi Line ::Express, Semi-Express, Local :::Saginuma - Tama- Plaza - Azamino ==Other websites== *Tokyu Corp station information Category:Railway stations in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Yokohama
title: Tama-Plaza Station
